Free.one: Basic workout plan: Users will receive a generic workout plan suitable for most people, not personalized.
Free.two: Library of instructional videos: Access a library of instructional videos for basic exercises to help you start your fitness journey.
Free.three: Nutrition articles and resources: Access basic nutrition articles and resources to improve your understanding of healthy eating.
Free.four: Join the community: Join BetterWE's online community, where you can share experiences and receive support from other members.

Basic.two: Detailed video instructions for each exercise.
Basic.four: Access BetterWE's online community to share and receive support from other members.

Advanced.one: All the benefits of the Basic Package.
Advanced.three: In-depth nutritional consultation and weekly menu.
Advanced.four: Direct support from the coach via chat.
Advanced.five: Participate in weekly live-stream training sessions.
Advanced.six: 10% discount when purchasing BetterWE workout equipment products.

Premium.one: All benefits of the Advanced Package.
Premium.two: Personalized daily workout plan, including advanced and specialized exercises.
Premium.three: Personalized nutritional consultation with detailed daily menu.
Premium.four: Live support from coaches via chat and video calls.
Premium.five: Participate in weekly live-stream training sessions and live nutrition consultation sessions.
Premium.six: 20% off when purchasing BetterWE workout equipment products.
Premium.seven: Get a free basic workout kit when registering for 3 months or more.
Premium.eight: Access BetterWE's exclusive in-depth fitness and nutrition courses.
